meanings.definition: Wooden paneling on the lower part of a room's walls.
meanings.sent1: The wainscoting in the dining room adds a cozy feel to the space.
meanings.sent2: The old house had beautiful wainscoting that showcased intricate designs.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the wainscoting was a perfect scratching post.
meanings.sent4: The wainscoting stood like a loyal guard, protecting the walls from scuffs and marks.
meanings.sent5: Running a hand along the smooth wainscoting brought a sense of warmth to the room.

meanings.definition: To cover or line with wooden paneling.
meanings.sent1: They decided to wainscoting the entire hallway for a rustic look.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter will wainscoting the walls with precision and care.
meanings.sent3: The children wanted to surprise their parents by wainscoting the living room overnight.
meanings.sent4: She wainscotings the room as if painting a masterpiece on the walls.
meanings.sent5: The cozy cabin was wainscoted with wood that smelled of pine and memories.
